body:
## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination
“I had the strangest auditory hallucinations, as if someone was speaking on a PA system, and the laughter around me was in echoed unison. Every sound had a lazer like quality to it, and the music beats were so deep and peircing. It was defintely sensory overload.

It was impossible to move, to say anything, to comprehend what people were saying to me ... I was in a different dimension. I managed to get myself to the bathroom, which was an adventure of its own, and the bathroom wasn't even 10 feet away. I looked insane on the bathrroom mirror..seriuosly like a cartoon caracter, something fantastical from Shrek or the cat in the hat...THESE were visuals...Everything was strobing, with tracers, it was impossible to focus on anything. There are so few words to describe what was happening in my mind at the time...” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=32112).
If you know of an experience report that demonstrates the risk rating of this combination, please share the experience report with us.

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

“the 5-meo-dipt had smoothly sailed into my personal world, effortlessly combining it's own brand of intense physical energy with the mood lift that was already rolling through me from the 2c-t-2. I felt great. I danced, I shook, I let my limbs be taken over by the bass.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=6111).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

“I step into the shower just as a huge energy rush hits and I look down at the shower floor not quite sure if I’m enjoying this or not. This is the heaviest body load I’ve ever felt on a psychedelic. The walls of the shower are made of earth-tone tiles with white grout in between, making a contrasting grid pattern I’d never seen so sharply. I can’t stare for too long, it’s almost too much.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=30604).
“I found that while I wanted to both puke and poop I could not easily do either… When I washed my hands the water in the sink bubbled as it when down the drain, the tiles warped and swirled, and my exit was hard to realize as the hallways bent. My mind was becoming more and more clouded and I almost didn’t make it out. Eventually I did and I reunited with my friends and we journeyed onward towards the lake. My visuals were very intense by now and I was having trouble communicating.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=94130).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

“i'm chewing some gum and clenching really bad. sleep is nowhere in sight. i get up and walk around in the dark for a while. i have distinct open-eye-visuals. those are cool. lots of red lasers shooting around. there were some auditory hallucinations as well. every sound was amplified at least 5 times. i couldn't lay still. every time i would lie down i would find myself kicking my legs around. i would tell myself to calm down but it was not working. my thoughts made no sense and i was starting to freak out. i would bounce back and forth from my front room to my bedroom trying to fall asleep but to no avail.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=4486).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

“This trip was never very intense. The visual hallucinations were mild but beautiful patterns covering everything. Walls breathed and colors were heightened but I did not see entities and people's faces did not distort.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=9218).
“Most adequetly described, the expierence was like having butterflies in my stomach, but some ravenous meat eating strain of butterflies. Marijuana mellowed me out. But overall, coming up I was quite nervous and anxious and this seemed to be the root of my stomach irritation.” [Erowid](https://www.erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=27081).

“The moment I exhaled, I began to trip 1000x times harder, and at that moment I realized I was in for more than I bargained for. I was already tripping massive balls, and I knew that I was still on the come up, so things were only going to get more intense” [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=97670).
“There are very sensual feelings in the body, with definite tactile enhancement. I feel warm and flushed but I am not sweating. The energy in my face seems to be creeping out into the world now, and consequently something happens to my eyes… a visual effect is beginning to develop, and the world is starting to change.” [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=68303).

“When I combine nitrous oxide with psychedelics, it takes me to a dissociative void, but at the same time I have all of these mystical thoughts about infinity and impossible logic and what have you. ## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"I think it makes the experience more vague and strange but also more interesting than ketamine on it's own. "For a first try of this combo, I wouldn't hit any weed while you're still re-dosing and/or coming up on the k -- wait until you're as high as you're going to be on the ketamine. If any of these variables is off, I'd put the peace pipe down until you're coming down, bearing in mind that smoking on the comedown also has the potential revive peak effects of the ketamine." ## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"It will make the visuals more pronounced but it can add anxiety if you do not smoke a lot or get anxiety from marijuana easily. For someone who smokes a lot, it can help calm them down and is very enjoyable. If you smoke a lot of weed usually, you would probably like to smoke while on LSD but if you don't then I would advise against it, unless your trip is not strong/substantial enough for you." [Bluelight](https://bluelight.org/xf/threads/combo-subthread-lsd-cannabis.395983/).

"At midnight I got home from going out to eat with my friends, and I was looking for a quick way to get to sleep so I smoked two bowls. My intentions were to see what it was like smoking while on LSD, and then fall promptly to sleep. That was definitely not what happened...  I opened my eyes to my dark room, and I couldn't make out what was in front of my face. The visuals had turned into a full-screen movie that played over and over as I tried to focus on my surroundings. I saw people from my past doing things that I had seen them do, random tasks, but they wouldn't stop and I began to get afraid" [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=5100).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"For lack of a better description, I find the nitrous smooths out the DMT experience considerably. Some of the more intense physical effects of the DMT are tempered, like the heaviness in the chest, the sometimes overwhelming rushy feel, the shortness of breath. These all seem to be rendered rather inconsequential with the addition of the nitrous. It’s hard to feel the body load when there is no real sense of having a body. Visually it is more intense than DMT alone. The usual kaleidoscoping fractals, clown images and flashing lights explode in a fury of incomprehensible madness, as if moving into a fourth dimension. Sound, colour and shape become almost indistinguishable, blending together in perfect synethesia... tendency for the nitrous to prolong the effects of the DMT. The linear curve of the comedown was much longer, with visuals still being present up to a half hour later." [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=66034).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"As the world came back into focus, it was as if I was within a Picasso painting. The wall directly across from me, being a two dimensional image on the page of a book, for instance, in a sober state of mind, immediately leaped out of the page into three dimensional existence. The wall gained depth by promptly becoming many walls, at least three, each having a slightly different distance from me, but all in the same position at the same time." [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=23350).

"We both started to get auditory hallucinations of some sort of humming all around us as if their was a UFO hovering above us and I turned around and saw the face of an alien entity on an aspen tree that was staring at me." [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=87683).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"I think recreational doses of DXM and an opiate would be a bad idea. Codeine even worse - I know DXM releases a large amount of histamine (at least it did / does in me - I was itching like crazy for hours - I took ~750mg my one and only time). You may also end up too dissociated to realize you're having respiratory issues which could be fatal at worst." [Bluelight](https://bluelight.org/xf/threads/dxm-opiates.612220/).

"i love mixing low doses of DXM with opiates... if you just want to potentiate and not get much of a DXM feel, go for 30-60mgs before you take your opiate dose. however, increasing the dose to 90-150 gives a nice, speedy buzz that synergizes with opiates well IMO" [Bluelight](https://bluelight.org/xf/threads/using-dxm-to-pontentiate-opiates-questions.649704/).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"I was instantly slammed into a completely black and empty world as if someone had put a bag over my head and beat me senseless. I saw short bursts of bright white light above me and I felt like thousands of volts of electricity were passing through my brain." [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=18493).

"I could now only hear my song, and let me tell you, it was the most beautiful thing I have, to this day, ever heard. The echo and chorus on it sounded like it was digitally pumped up 200%. I was suddenly concious of my slowing breathing until it stopped. I have never passed out before from a drug, and I believe this is what I did. The colors I saw after the black faded were incrediable. Blues, reds, oranges, purples and whites (purple and red dominated the vision) spun around in a wonderful ballet" [Erowid](https://erowid.org/experiences/exp.php?ID=6640).

## Reports of people trying this psychoactive combination

"...for the most commonly prescribed SSRI antidepressants today, the effect upon enzyme activity is actually quite minor. There are some SSRI's that were known to have a pretty serious effect upon certain Opioids (re: Fluvoxamine -> Methadone), but the aforementioned drug has been discontinued for the most part, with one of the reasons being that it did have the potential to screw with other prescription medications. "I've taken both Effexor & Wellbutrin at high doses & neither affected my opiate use/its effects (hydrocodone & oxycodone at the time)." [Bluelight](https://bluelight.org/xf/threads/is-morphine-opium-affected-by-ssris-snris.862619/).
